parallel

Class PBTEThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • parallel.PBTEThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    final class PBTEThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    auxiliary class implementing the threads of the thread-pool of the class ParallelBatchTaskExecutor class, not part of the public API.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static int getNextId(ParallelBatchTaskExecutor e)
      implements a synchronized counter for each executor e, starting from 0, and incrementing by 1 each time it is called.
      private boolean isRunning() 
      void run()
      while the thread is running, it waits to receive data from the "forward" channel "ParallelBatchTaskExecutor$pbteid$" where $pbteid$ is the unique id of the executor object that spawned this thread, and if the data received is Runnable or TaskObject, it calls their run() method, else if the data is a ParallelBatchTaskExecutor.PoissonPill, the method returns, and the thread halts.
      (package private) void stopRunning()

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        while the thread is running, it waits to receive data from the "forward" channel "ParallelBatchTaskExecutor$pbteid$" where $pbteid$ is the unique id of the executor object that spawned this thread, and if the data received is Runnable or TaskObject, it calls their run() method, else if the data is a ParallelBatchTaskExecutor.PoissonPill, the method returns, and the thread halts. Any other kind of data, the thread simply prints a message that it can't execute the object received, and continues with the loop, which sends the data object to the "back" channel "ParallelBatchTaskExecutor_ack$pbteid$".
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • stopRunning

        void stopRunning()

      • isRunning

        private boolean isRunning()

      • getNextId

        private static int getNextId(ParallelBatchTaskExecutor e)
        implements a synchronized counter for each executor e, starting from 0, and incrementing by 1 each time it is called.
        Parameters:
        e - ParallelBatchTaskExecutor
        Returns:
        int
